text: Cellvibrio fontiphilus is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic and motile bacterium from the genus of Cellvibrio which has been isolated from the Maolin Spring in Taiwan. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Cellvibrio fontiphilus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Pseudomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Cellvibrio fontiphilus
